chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Talene Minly, p. 17 (3)—Golden-haired Sitter for the Green Ajah in Tar Valon. She used to be Seaine's friend. She has no Warders, which is extremely unusual for a Green. When Pevara shielded her because she suspected her of being Black Ajah, she tried to stab her. She actually is a member of the Black Ajah, and is now sworn to obey Pevara and Seaine unconditionally. See also Herimon, Seaine; Tazanovni, Pevara.
